sentences.english: More haste, less speed' is a well-known paradox.
sentences.chinese: 欲速不達＇是人所熟知的雋語。

sentences.english: The highly complex maneuver is known as the Cheng Fei vault.
sentences.chinese: 這一套高難度的動作便是人們所熟知的“程菲跳”。

sentences.english: As for Cambodia, the media's themes were familiar.
sentences.chinese: 至於柬埔寨，新聞界的調子是久已熟知的。

sentences.english: Acquaints students with the fundamental patterns and problems of the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 使學生熟知全球經濟的基礎規律及問題。

sentences.english: The result was the plug-spark as we know it today.
sentences.chinese: 結果便發明了我們今天所熟知的那種火花塞。

sentences.english: It is a world away from the world we know.
sentences.chinese: 這是與我們熟知的世界有着天壤之別的世界。

sentences.english: Most of the fighting in the Korean War took place along the geographic line known as the thirty-eighth parallel.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮戰爭中，大多戰役發生在人們所熟知的三八線上。

sentences.english: Nunchaku is perhaps one of the most well recognized weapons in2)martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 雙節棍可能是武術中最爲人所熟知的武器。

sentences.english: If you know your topic, you're pre-speaking fear will quickly evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你熟知演講主題，那些所謂的恐懼就會迅速消失。

sentences.english: He is a very productive writer, who wrote a lot of well-known novels.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位多產作家，寫了大量爲人熟知的小說。

sentences.english: Everybody's hep red-eyed disease is among them one of.
sentences.chinese: 大家熟知的紅眼病就是其中之一。

sentences.english: Wes Mantooth, the world hardly knew you.
sentences.chinese: 整個世界或許都還沒熟知你。

sentences.english: Now as the hometown of Kong Fansen, Liaocheng is known to Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 現在聊城作爲孔繁森的故鄉已爲華夏兒女所熟知。

sentences.english: This property is used in the well known hygrograph.
sentences.chinese: 這一性質被用於人們所熟知的自記溼度計中。

sentences.english: Maintain complete knowledge of all beverage selections, correct glassware and garnishes in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 熟知餐廳的酒水及相應的杯子和裝金飾。

sentences.english: Till now, people have known very well about the interferences of the mechanical and electromagnetic waves.
sentences.chinese: 機械波與電磁波的干涉現象已爲人們所熟知。

definition: what's frequently heard can be repeated in detail (idiom)
well-known for sth/to become well known/to make one's mark
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
to be familiar with/to know well
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
to enter deeply into people's hearts/to have a real impact on the people (idiom)
called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
to be well acquainted with/to know well
to receive in no small measure
to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
